descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource

options.name: Control
options.description: Controls provide a user-friendly way to input a value that can affect other parts of the doc

options.name: Formula
options.description: Formulas can be great for performing one-off computations

options.name: Table
options.description: Access data of tables in documents

options.name: View
options.description: Access data of views in documents

resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

docId.name: docId
docId.description: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
docId.ai_hint: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: The table to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableId.ai_hint: The table to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: options
disableParsing
options.description: Whether the API will not attempt to parse the data in any way

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

rowId.name: rowId
rowId.description: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
rowId.ai_hint: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

columnId.name: columnId
columnId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
columnId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

formulaId.name: formulaId
formulaId.description: The formula to get the row from
formulaId.ai_hint: The formula to get the row from

controlId.name: controlId
controlId.description: The control to get the row from
controlId.ai_hint: The control to get the row from

viewId.name: viewId
viewId.description: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
viewId.ai_hint: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

keyName.name: keyName
keyName.description: The view to get the row from
keyName.ai_hint: The view to get the row from

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'table' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'createRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'createRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'createRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'rowId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllRows' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'deleteRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'deleteRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'deleteRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'rowId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'pushButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'pushButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'pushButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'rowId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'pushButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumn' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumn' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getColumn' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'table' AND operation == 'getAllColumns' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'formula' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'formula' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'formula' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'formulaId'
IF resource == 'formula' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'formula' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'formula' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'control' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'control' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'control' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'controlId'
IF resource == 'control' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'control' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'control' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'view' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'viewId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'viewId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewRows' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'viewId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'getAllViewColumns' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'deleteViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'deleteViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'viewId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'deleteViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'rowId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'pushViewButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'pushViewButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'viewId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'pushViewButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'rowId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'pushViewButton' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'updateViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'docId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'updateViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'viewId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'updateViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'rowId'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'updateViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'keyName'
IF resource == 'view' AND operation == 'updateViewRow' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
